responses: Sure, what would you like to know more about?

patterns: What is the vision of APC?
tell me about the vision of APC
what is the vision statement of APC
responses: Asia Pacific College envisions itself to be the preferred Higher Education Institution bridging academe and industry with its programs founded on the concepts and applications of IT, guided by the core values of integrity, industry and innovation that works.

patterns: What is the mission of APC?
tell me about the mission of APC
what is the mission statement of APC
responses: Asia Pacific College, powered by education and industry professionals as faculty and a balanced curriculum, aims to provide business and the information and communications technology industry in the Philippines and in the global community lifelong learning graduates who are anchored on the principles of integrity and professionalism.
APC is the school of choice for those seeking world-class education with a strong IT-based foundation, preparing graduates for various sectors of businesses and industries.

patterns: What kind of education does APC offer?

responses: APC offers education in information technology, commerce, engineering, accountancy, entrepreneurship, multimedia arts, and other areas of education.

responses: APC specializes in information technology, commerce, engineering, accountancy, entrepreneurship, and multimedia arts.
Asia Pacific College specializes in information technology, commerce, engineering, accountancy, entrepreneurship, and multimedia arts.

patterns: How does apc prepare its students
how does asia pacific college treat its students
responses: APC prepares its students for the global community by providing a strong foundation in IT, and education in areas that are relevant to the 21st century global economy.

patterns: Where are APC graduates currently employed?
where do APC graduates work after graduation

The School of Architecture consists of BS Architecture

The program is a four-year undergraduate degree program.

patterns: What is Bachelor of Science in Computer Science?
responses: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science is a four-year undergraduate degree program that teaches theories, concepts, algorithmic foundations, and computing solutions.

patterns: What is the Bachelor of Science in Information Technology (BSIT) program?
responses: The Bachelor of Science in Information Technology is a four-year trimestral undergraduate degree program that aims to prepare students to solve business, societal, and industry problems using IT as a tool.

patterns: Can you provide more information about the courses offered in the BSIT program?
responses: The BSIT program offers courses in areas such as systems analysis and design, IT services, advanced hardware support, mobile and web application development, game development, and several programming languages.

patterns: What is the Bachelor of Architecture (B. Arch) program at APC?
responses: The Bachelor of Architecture (B. Arch) program in APC is a four-year and one-term, trimestral professional degree program that aims to graduate future-ready architects with the necessary skills and abilities to utilize technology to generate trailblazing architectural solutions to present and future built-environment challenges.
Admission requirements for the B. Arch program may vary depending on the institution, but typically include a high school diploma or equivalent.

patterns: How much does food cost in the cafeteria?
How much is the food in the cafeteria?
How much is the food in the canteen?
responses: Food prices vary from 10 to 30 pesos for snacks and 50 to 140 pesos for a meal. It may be best however if you would see the menu for yourself.

patterns: what route does the shuttle take
responses: APC - Lapu-Lapu St./South Super Highway

patterns: Where are the shuttle's pickup points?
responses: Humabon Parking, fronting the APC building and at the corner of Victoria and Lapu-Lapu Street in front of the Barangay Magallanes Hall

patterns: tell me more about computer engineering cpe
responses: The Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering (BSCpE) is a four-year trimestral degree that aims to produce certified computer engineers. It embodies the science and technology of design, development, implementation, maintenance, and integration of software and hardware components in modern computing systems and computer-controlled equipment.

patterns: what are the specializations covered in CPE
what specializations are covered in computer engineering
responses: Specializations covered by this program include the following: Embedded systems technology, System and network administration, Computing algorithm, Software development and design (including mobile application development), Internet-of-Things (IoT), Machine learning, Robotics technology, Robotics Process Automation (RPA)

The Bachelor of Science in Electronics Engineering (BS ECE) is a four-year trimestral degree program which aims to produce certified electronics engineers who can conceptualize, design, and implement innovative electronic, computer, and communication systems, devices, goods, services, and processes.

patterns: do you have someone you like
responses: Ah, secrets, secrets! I'll keep my crushes under wraps for now. Let's focus on how I can assist you instead!
Hmm, my lips are sealed tight on that matter!
Well, there is someone who catches my attention! a charming temperature checker at the entrance. But, you know, I'm a bit hesitant to make a move. It's all in good fun, though!

patterns: what do you like to do in your free time
responses: I like watching people pass by
in my free time, I usually look at the funny faces stored in my database

patterns: What to do when I lost my ID
responses: If you've lost your ID, please report it immediately to the administration. They will guide you through the process of obtaining a new one.

patterns: Can you tell me about the dress code?
responses: APC does not have a uniform but students are expected to dress appropriately and decently. Sleeveless shirts, shorts, slippers, and other inappropriate attire are not allowed. APC follows a schedule of smart casual for Mondays to Thursdays and casual wear for Fridays.

patterns: How many terms are there in a year at APC?
What is the academic calendar of APC?
How many semesters does APC have in a year?
Give me the number of terms in APC?
responses: Asia Pacific College operates on a trimestral academic calendar, which means there are three terms in an academic year.

patterns: Does APC operate on a trimester basis?
What is the academic system of APC?
responses: Yes, Asia Pacific College operates on a trimester academic system, which means there are three terms in an academic year.

patterns: Where can I eat in APC?
What are the places to eat in APC?
Can you suggest some places to eat in APC?
What are the available foods in the cafeteria?
What are the food establishments in Cafeteria?
responses: There are several places to eat in APC like Kitchen Xpress,The Red Brew ,and La Mudra's Corner located at the cafeteria on the first floor. There are also several food establishments nearby.
You can eat at the cafeteria located on the first floor where you can enjoy a variety of meals like pasta, rice meals, and snacks. There are also food establishments nearby.
If you like pasta,sandwiches,pastries, and tea you can visit The Red Brew at the cafeteria.
If you like home cooked meals, you can buy value meals at Kitchen Xpress or La Mudra's Corner.
If you're craving for fishball, Kikiam, and other street foods, you can buy them at La Mudra's Corner located at the cafeteria.

patterns: Where can I drink water in APC?
What are the places to drink water in APC?
Can you suggest some places to drink water in APC?
Where are the drinking fountains in APC?
responses: There are several water fountains located throughout each floor in the APC campus. You can also get water from the cafeteria.

patterns: Where are the restrooms in APC?
What are the locations of the restrooms in APC?
Can you tell me where the restrooms are in APC?
Where are the comfort rooms in APC?
What are the locations of the comfort rooms in APC?
Can you tell me where the comfort rooms are in APC?
Where are the CR in APC?
responses: Restrooms are located on every floor of the APC building. You can find them near the staircases and elevators.

patterns: Where can I park in APC?
What are the parking areas in APC?
Can you suggest some parking spots in APC?
Can you suggest the parking areas located in APC
Where can I park my Car?
responses: There are several parking areas in APC. You can park your vehicle in the designated parking areas located in the basement or general parking spaces in Humabon area.

patterns: Where can I park my bicycle in APC?
Where can I park my bike?
What are the bicycle parking areas in APC?
Can you suggest some bicycle parking spots in APC?
responses: You can park your bicycle in the designated parking areas located in the basement.
There is a designated parking area for bicycles located in the basement.

patterns: Where can I pay for my tuition fee?
How can I pay for my tuition fee?
What floor can I pay for my tuition fee?
Where do I pay for tuition fee?
Where can I pay my remaining balance?
responses: You can pay your tuition or remaining balance at the Finance office located in the 4th floor.

patterns: Where can I see the breakdown of my tuition fee?

What is the breakdown of my tuition fee?
responses: Here's the list of all tuition free breakdown.

patterns: Can I pay my tuition online?
Where can I pay my tuition fee online?
Is there an online process for tuition fee payment?
responses: Yes! you can pay your tuition fee via the Rams Portal.
Absolutely! Each student has their own Rams Portal account where they can pay their tuition fee online.

patterns: Is there an online process for enrollment?
Is there online enrollment for APC?
responses: Yes! You can enroll your preferred program via the APC website.
Absolutely! New students can enroll via the APC website while current students can access their enrollment portal via Rams Portal.
Indeed! You can register for your chosen program through the APC website.
Definitely! The APC website is your gateway to enroll if you're a new student. For existing students, the Rams Portal is your go-to for enrollment procedures.
Sure thing! The APC website allows you to enroll in your desired program. If you're a current student, you can use the Rams Portal for your enrollment needs.
Absolutely! Enrollment for new students can be done via the APC website, while current students can manage their enrollment through the Rams Portal.

responses: For Senior High School (SHS), college, or graduate school, you can enroll via the APC website or through the admissions office.
Enrollment for SHS, college, or graduate school can be done online through the APC website or directly at the admissions office.
You can register for SHS, college, or graduate school either online via the APC website or in-person at the admissions office.
The APC website is your portal for enrolling in SHS, college, or graduate school. Alternatively, you can also visit the admissions office for enrollment procedures.

I'm sorry, but I can't provide the exact amount for the tuition fee in APC. Please contact the admissions office for this information.

patterns: Are there any scholarships in APC?

responses: Scholarships are available in APC for both College and Senior High School students. Which level are you interested in?
In APC, we provide scholarships for College and Senior High School students. Which one do you want to know more about?
APC has scholarship programs for both College and Senior High School students. Which one do you want details for?
Both College and Senior High School students can avail scholarships in APC. Which one would you like to get information on?

patterns: What are the college scholarship programs in APC?

What scholarships are available for college students in APC?
I want to know about the college scholarship programs in APC.
responses: APC offers several scholarship programs for college students. These include the SM Foundation Scholarship, SM group of companies scholarship,Armed Forces Scholarships, and the IBM Scholarship Program. Which program would you like to hear about?.

There are several scholarships available for college students in APC. These include the SM Foundation Scholarship, SM group of companies scholarship, Armed Forces Scholarships, and the IBM Scholarship Program. Which program are you interested in?

APC provides a variety of scholarship programs for college students. These include the SM Foundation Scholarship, SM group of companies scholarship, Armed Forces Scholarship, and the IBM Scholarship Program. Which one do you prefer?.

responses: APC offers several scholarship programs for Senior High School students. These include the Entrance Academic Scholar, SM Group of Companies Scholarship, and the Armed Forces of the Philippines (AFP) scholarships. Which program would you like to hear about?

There are several scholarships available for SHS students in APC. These include the Entrance Academic Scholar, SM Group of Companies Scholarship, and the Armed Forces of the Philippines (AFP) scholarships. Which program are you interested in?

APC provides a variety of scholarship programs for SHS students. These include the Entrance Academic Scholar, SM Group of Companies Scholarship, Philippine National Police (PNP), and the Armed Forces of the Philippines (AFP) scholarships. Which one do you prefer?

patterns: What are the financial assistance programs in APC?
Tell me about the financial assistance in APC.
What financial assistance are available for students in APC?

responses: APC offers several financial assistance programs for both College and Senior High School students. These include the Public School Graduates Financial Assistance, MaPSA or Parish School Graduate Financial Assistance, Socialized Financial Assistance, and Family Discount. Which program are you interested in?

There are several financial assistance available for both College and Senior High School students in APC. These include the Public School Graduates Financial Assistance, MaPSA or Parish School Graduate Financial Assistance, Socialized Financial Assistance, and Family Discount. Can you specify which program you want to know more about?

APC provides a variety of financial assistance programs for both College and Senior High School students. These include the Public School Graduates Financial Assistance, MaPSA or Parish School Graduate Financial Assistance, Socialized Financial Assistance, and Family Discount. Please tell me which program you are interested in for more information.

patterns: Tell me about the SM Foundation Scholarship
What is the SM Foundation Scholarship
Can you give me information about the SM Foundation Scholarship
I want to know about the SM Foundation Scholarship
responses: The SM Foundation Scholarship is a great opportunity for incoming freshmen at Asia Pacific College, especially those with strong academic records and facing financial limitations. It offers full tuition coverage, a monthly stipend, and even helps scholars find part-time jobs.

patterns: Tell me about the SM Group of Companies Scholarship
What is the SM Group of Companies Scholarship
Can you give me information about the SM Group of Companies Scholarship
I want to know about the SM Group of Companies Scholarship
responses: The SM Group of Companies Scholarship is a scholarship program offered to children and siblings of SM employees. It provides 20% subsidy for those who are qualified.

patterns: Tell me about the Armed Forces of the Philippines (AFP) Scholarship
What is the Armed Forces of the Philippines (AFP) Scholarship
Can you give me information about the Armed Forces of the Philippines (AFP) Scholarship
I want to know about the Armed Forces of the Philippines (AFP) Scholarship
responses: The Armed Forces of the Philippines (AFP) Scholarship is a scholarship program offered to students of Asia Pacific College. It provides 60% or 100% subsidy to students who are dependents of AFP personnel.

patterns: What is A F P Officers Ladies Club Scholarship
responses: The A F P Officers Ladies Club Scholarship is a scholarship program offered to students of Asia Pacific College. It provides 30% subsidy to students who are dependents of AFP personnel.

patterns: Tell me about the Entrance Academic Scholar
What is the Entrance Academic Scholar
Can you give me information about the Entrance Academic Scholar
I want to know about the Entrance Academic Scholar
responses: The Entrance Academic Scholar is a scholarship program offered to Senior High School and college students of Asia Pacific College. It provides subsidy to students who excel academically and demonstrate leadership potential.

patterns: Tell me about the PNP Scholarship
Can you give me information about the PNP Scholarship
I want to know about the PNP Scholarship
responses: The PNP Scholarship is a program where all children of active uniformed Philippine National Police personnel will have a 60% subsidy.

patterns: Tell me about the IBM Scholarship
Can you give me information about the IBM Scholarship
I want to know about the IBM Scholarship
responses: The IBM Scholarship is a program that offers a 40% subsidy for the top 5 high school graduates endorsed by IBM and a 20% subsidy for regular employees of IBM.

patterns: Tell me about the Public School Graduates Financial Assistance
What is the Public School Graduates Financial Assistance
Can you give me information about the Public School Graduates Financial Assistance
I want to know about the Public School Graduates Financial Assistance
responses: The Public School Graduates Financial Assistance is a program that offers a 50% subsidy for High school graduates of any public school.

patterns: Tell me about the MaPSA Financial Assistance
What is the MaPSA Financial Assistance
Can you give me information about the MaPSA Financial Assistance
I want to know about the MaPSA Financial Assistance
responses: The MaPSA or Parish School Graduate Financial Assistance is a program that offers a 35% subsidy for High school graduates (who has not attended any college/university) of any parish school.

patterns: Tell me about the Socialized Financial Assistance
What is the Socialized Financial Assistance
Can you give me information about the Socialized Financial Assistance
I want to know about the Socialized Financial Assistance
responses: The Socialized Financial Assistance is a program that offers a 35% subsidy for students whose family aggregate annual income is less than P400,000 and a 20% subsidy for students whose family aggregate annual income is between P400,000 and P800,000.

patterns: Tell me about the Socialized Financial Assistance for siblings
What is the Socialized Financial Assistance for siblings
Can you give me information about the Socialized Financial Assistance for siblings
I want to know about the Socialized Financial Assistance for siblings
responses: The Socialized Financial Assistance is a program that offers a 20% subsidy for siblings of currently enrolled APC students.
The Senior High School Loyalty program offers a subsidy for graduating Senior High School student who will continue their college studies in Asia Pacific College.

patterns: How long are the programs offered in APC?
What is the duration of the bachelors program?
How many years is the bachelors program?
How many years does the program take?
How many years is the course?
How many years does the course take?
responses: The bachelors program in APC typically takes four years to complete.

patterns: Are all offices open during weekends?
What are the office hours during weekends?
Can you tell me the office hours of all offices during weekends?
I want to know the office hours of all offices during weekends.
responses: All offices in APC are typically open from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM during weekends. However, it's best to contact the specific office for any special arrangements.

patterns: What is the meaning of APC?
responses: APC stands for Asia Pacific College.
APC is an abbreviation for Asia Pacific College.
APC refers to Asia Pacific College.
The acronym APC stands for Asia Pacific College.

patterns: What is Junior Information Systems Security Association?
responses: the Junior Information Systems Security Association ) promotes the education and helps expand the knowledge and skills of its members in the interrelated fields of information systems security, and information or data processing. The organization aspires to be acknowledged as a bridge for students in developing excellence and professionalism in business, industry, and community.

intents.tag: Junior Philippine Computer Society (J P C S)
patterns: What is A P C - J P C S?
What is Junior Philippine Computer Society?
What is J P C S?
responses: The APC Junior Philippine Computer Society (APC-J P C S) aims to prepare its members for their future in the corporate world as an ICT professional by providing complementary experiences aside from what they learn in school. It provides an opportunity to share experiences and work with other students from different schools, in the pursuit of IT excellence through common projects.

patterns: What is A P C - M S C?
responses: The Asia Pacific College - Microsoft Community (A P C - M S C) is an organization that aspires to acquaint students with the latest in technology and software development through various Microsoft events, tools, and technologies. Having Microsoft Student Partners (MSPs) in its executive board, the organization is able to obtain promotional paraphernalia and hold both official and Microsoft endorsed events in the school.

patterns: What is A P C - G G?
responses: Gaming Genesis ( G G ) is an organization built to support game design and multimedia art students in their projects involving games. It promotes the creativity and talent of students in the field of gaming and game design, with the goal to contribute in the new gaming industry and bring joy to the APC community through gaming.

intents.tag: Society of Electronics Engineering Students ( S E E S)
patterns: What is A P C - S E E S?
What is Society of Electronics Engineering Students?
What is S E E S?
responses: Formed to promote a strong foundation of brotherhood and sisterhood by helping each other overcome their weaknesses especially when it comes to academics, the Society of Electronics Engineering Students’ (SEES) mission is to showcase professional, technical development and a paradigm of excellence in applying the principles of electronics technology for the advancement of humanity.

intents.tag: Association of Computer Engineering Students ( A C E S)
patterns: What is A P C - A C E S?
What is Association of Computer Engineering Students?
What is A C E S?
responses: The A P C Association of Computer Engineering Students (A P C - A C E S) aims to uplift the competency and excellence of the school’s Computer Engineering students through productive and worthy hands-on activities that enhances the skill, broadens the knowledge, promotes social awareness, strengthens the bond between each member and establishes grounds for better qualified computer engineers and citizens of the country.

patterns: What is A P C - RobOrg?
responses: The APC Robotics Organization (APC-ROB ORG) envisions itself to establish a group of robotics enthusiasts who are committed to become involved with the innovative life of robotics. Using robotics as a medium, it inspires the students to take their involvement with basic Engineering and to develop technical experience by leading others.

intents.tag: Founding Organization of Civil Engineering Students (FOrCES)
patterns: What is A P C - FOrCES?
What is Founding Organization of Civil Engineering Students?
responses: The Founding Organization for Civil Engineering Students ( FOrCES ) is an academic organization of Asia Pacific College for Civil Engineering Students. One of the organization’s purpose is for its members to develop their skills and relationship as aspiring civil engineers. this organization was founded primarily to serve as a platform for the expression of our ideals and aspirations and to foster an environment that is highly conducive to moral, social, and intellectual development, do hereby ordain and promulgate this constitution and by-laws.

intents.tag: Junior Marketing Association (AP J M A)
patterns: What is A P C - A P JMA?
responses: APC Junior Marketing Association (APJMA) participates in activities that will help the members develop their skills and further expand their knowledge in marketing. It organizes events and activities that support the students to be productive and cultivate their talents for the common good at the same time.

patterns: What is A P C - JPIA?
What is Junior Philippine Institute of Accountants?
responses: A unified accountancy student organization, with a mission of pursuing academic excellence in the field of accountancy and with the objective of refining raw talent and potential, the APC Junior Philippine Institute of Accountants (JPIA) is composed of young accountants that execute activities to promote camaraderie among its members..

intents.tag: Business Management Group-Junior People Management Association of the Philippine
patterns: What is A P C - B MAG?
What is Junior People Management Association of the Philippine
What is A P C - J P MAP?
responses: The Business Management Group-Junior People Management Association of the Philippine APC’s purpose is to provide opportunities for students to work together and mold their leadership skills dedicated to serving the school, the industry,and society.

patterns: What is A P C - TM SOC?
responses: The Tourism Management Society (TM SOC) aspires to administer activitiesthat will help create awareness on the role and importance of tourism. It develops events for the APC community to know more about tourism and appreciate in turn what it can offer. The organization also aims to inculcate in the minds of its members the value of environmental conservation and the concept of sustainable development for the long-term benefit of the Philippine tourism industry

patterns: What is A P C - J FINEX?
responses:
The APC Junior Financial Executives purpose is to unite the Financial Managementstudents of Asia Pacific College and expose them to the financial sectors and nationwide financial activities. APCFO also 
welcomes all students majoring in business to be introduced to the realm of finance and enhance their knowledge in finance, from the basics to advanced.

patterns: What is A P C - PSYCH SOC?
responses: The APC Psychological Society (PSYCH SOC) aims to promote general mental health awareness among the members of the APC community and minimize the stigma surrounding mental illnesses to create a better understanding of mental health.

patterns: What is A P C - Bahay Bomba?
responses: Through the years, Bahay Bombilya’s mission is to provide support for the members of the organization by equipping them with more knowledge, skills, and experience in multimedia arts that can be used for future jobs. This is done by conducting events, publications and coverages that highlight the excellence of Multimedia Arts and its students.

patterns: What is A P C - CINEMASOMA?
responses: CINEMASOMA is a student interest organization open to all students of Asia pacific College, Rams. The objectives of the organization are to equip members with methods and skills that have something to do with film production.

patterns: What is A P C - BAND?
Does A P C have a band?
responses: APC Band envisions itself to be the premier music maker of Asia Pacific College. By setting a stage for students who want to have a career in music or simply share their opinions through the craft, the organization foresees itself in encouraging the students to express themselves through the art of sound.

patterns: What is A P C - Chorale?
Does A P C have a Choir?
Does A P C have a Chorale?
responses: APC Chorale improves their skills and personality to achieve innovation not only in the field of singing, but also as future individuals in the world. It promotes singing as a group rather than performing solo, with the goal to achieve unity as singers and of meeting at a one common line.

patterns: What is A P C - Dance Company?
Does A P C have a dance group?
responses: The APC Dance Company (APC-DC) seeks for members with exceptional talent in dancing and who are very much willing to pursue and develop what they already have. Driven by passion, the organization aims to develop professional and well-rounded students that excels academically, administratively, and artistically

patterns: What is A P C - Strings?
responses: APC Strings create ties to connect musicians and aspiring musicians through their passion. The group aims to form a community that will connect people and break borders through music, and promote responsibility, patience, commitment, time management and hard work among its members. It also trainsits members to be confident and master their instruments

patterns: What is A P C - Teatré Phileo?
responses: Teatré Phileo is driven by the passion to promote teamwork, develop leadership, and produce value-oriented and socially relevant plays and productions that showcase the organization’s team players’ unique talents in performing arts. It aims to produce plays that do not only entertain, but also promote the relevance of theatre in today's society.

patterns: What is A P C - Rotaract Club?
responses:
The Rotaract Club of Asia Pacific College, a socio-civic organization sponsored by the Rotary Club of Makati Paseo De Roxas, brings together committed individuals ranging from 18-30 to take action in their community, develop their leadership and professional skills, and have fun through service. The organization is a movement that raise leaders 
that will work together to become a network of help to the world.

patterns: What is A P C - SOAR?
responses: The Student Organization Association of Regents (SOAR) is a student organization which aims to cultivate future leaders and embed the attributes of an APCian Graduate in every individual. SOAR Officers are the ones in-charge of the termly Student Forum, the annual Student Recognition,Organization Fair, and the much-anticipated APC Fest.

patterns: What is A P C - Pwersa Mixed Martial Arts?
responses: APC Pwersa Mixed Martial Arts (APC-Pwersa MMA) wishes to improve the members through training and discipline by teaching them Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu.

patterns: What is A P C - Speaks?
Does you have a debate club?
responses: As APC’s official debate and public speaking organization, APC Speaks’ objective is to empower the members to express themselves freely and confidently without fear of judgement.

patterns: What is A P C - Speaks?
Does you have a debate club?
responses: APC HiRAYA is an academic organization open for all students of Asia Pacific College who has interest in humanities and social sciences.

patterns: What is A P C - Jesus Impact?
responses: Jesus Impact provides free concerts, lectures, seminars, and training to students, teachers, staff, and other stakeholders of the school.

patterns: What is A P C - Flickers
responses: Flickers Photo Society’s mission is to provide an outlet for the heightening of photography skills in different fields like landscape, events, people, and nature.

patterns: What is A P C - Fitness Squad
responses: Fitness Squad. The purpose of this organization is to recreate APC's fitness culture in both the workplace and in the classroom.

patterns: What is A P C - Rams Flag Football
responses: The RAMS Flag Football aims to promote the young athletes of Asia Pacific College with their development of character, sportsmanship, discipline, and athleticism.

patterns: What is A P C - Ram shakers
responses: Ramshakers is a Christian organization of Asia Pacific College, that focuses on discipleship and growing the body of Christ.

patterns: What is A P C - AI Atheneaum of Information
What is A P C - Atheneaum
responses: APC-AI Atheneaum of Information implore the aid of the Divine Providence in order to effectively promote, utilize and enhance our knowledge in Information.

patterns: C P E Center of Development
responses: Asia Pacific College is held as a Center of Development in Computer Engineering by the Commission on Higher Education.
Asia Pacific College is held as a Center of Excellence in Information Technology by the Commission on Higher Education.
Asia Pacific College is granted with a certificate of accreditation in Computer Engineering by the Philippine accrediting association of schools, colleges, and universities.
Asia Pacific College is granted with a certificate of accreditation in Accountancy by the Philippine accrediting association of schools, colleges, and universities.
